verses.verse: אָ֣ז <WH227> Then יַקְהֵ֣ל <WH6950> assembled שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> Then Solomon אֶת־ <WH853> זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> and all the heads הַמַּטּוֹת֩ <WH4294> of the tribes נְשִׂיאֵ֨י <WH5387> the chief הָאָב֜וֹת <WH1> of the fathers לִבְנֵ֧י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> unto king שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> Solomon יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem לְֽהַעֲל֞וֹת <WH5927> that they might bring up אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֧וֹן <WH727> the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD מֵעִ֥יר <WH5892> out of the city דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> of David הִ֥יא <WH1931> which צִיּֽוֹן׃ <WH6726> which [is] Zion

וַיִּקָּ֨הֲל֜וּ <WH6950> assembled אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> themselves unto king שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <WH8010> Solomon כָּל־ <WH3605> All אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> And all the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּיֶ֥רַח <WH3391> in the month הָאֵֽתָנִ֖ים <WH388> Ethanim בֶּחָ֑ג <WH2282> at the feast ה֖וּא <WH1931> which הַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁבִיעִֽי׃ <WH7637> which [is] the seventh

וַיָּבֹ֕אוּ <WH935> came כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> And all the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <WH5375> took up הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> and the priests אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָרֽוֹן׃ <WH727> the ark

וַֽיַּעֲל֞וּ <WH5927> And they brought up אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֤וֹן <WH727> the ark יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> and the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> of the congregation וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all כְּלֵ֥י <WH3627> vessels הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> and all the holy אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בָּאֹ֑הֶל <WH168> that [were] in the tabernacle וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <WH5927> bring up אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> even those did the priests וְהַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> and the Levites

וְהַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> And king שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <WH8010> Solomon וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עֲדַ֤ת <WH5712> and all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel הַנּוֹעָדִ֣ים <WH3259> that were assembled עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> and אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> for לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> unto him [were] with him before הָֽאָר֑וֹן <WH727> the ark מְזַבְּחִים֙ <WH2076> sacrificing צֹ֣אן <WH6629> sheep וּבָקָ֔ר <WH1241> and oxen אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> could יִסָּפְר֛וּ <WH5608> that could not be told וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or יִמָּנ֖וּ <WH4487> nor numbered מֵרֹֽב׃ <WH7230> for multitude

וַיָּבִ֣אוּ <WH935> brought in הַ֠כֹּהֲנִים <WH3548> And the priests אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֨וֹן <WH727> the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מְקוֹמ֛וֹ <WH4725> unto his place אֶל־ <WH413> into דְּבִ֥יר <WH1687> into the oracle הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> of the house אֶל־ <WH413> to קֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> to the most הַקֳּדָשִׁ֑ים <WH6944> holy אֶל־ <WH413> about תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under כַּנְפֵ֥י <WH3671> [place even] under the wings הַכְּרוּבִֽים׃ <WH3742> of the cherubims

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For הַכְּרוּבִים֙ <WH3742> For the cherubims פֹּרְשִׂ֣ים <WH6566> spread forth כְּנָפַ֔יִם <WH3671> [their] two wings אֶל־ <WH413> over מְק֖וֹם <WH4725> over the place הָֽאָר֑וֹן <WH727> of the ark וַיָּסֹ֧כּוּ <WH5526> covered הַכְּרֻבִ֛ים <WH3742> and the cherubims עַל־ <WH5921> over הָאָר֥וֹן <WH727> the ark וְעַל־ <WH5921> over בַּדָּ֖יו <WH905> and the staves מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <WH4605> thereof above

וַֽיַּאֲרִכוּ֮ <WH748> And they drew out הַבַּדִּים֒ <WH905> the staves וַיֵּרָאוּ֩ <WH7200> were seen out רָאשֵׁ֨י <WH7218> that the ends הַבַּדִּ֤ים <WH905> of the staves מִן־ <WH4480> from הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> in the holy עַל־ <WH5921> and פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> [place] before הַדְּבִ֔יר <WH1687> the oracle וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> could יֵרָא֖וּ <WH7200> and they were not seen הַח֑וּצָה <WH2351> without וַיִּ֣הְיוּ <WH1961> become שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> are there עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> and there they are unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

אֵ֚ין <WH369> There בָּֽאָר֔וֹן <WH727> [There was] nothing in the ark רַ֗ק <WH7535> save שְׁנֵי֙ <WH8147> the two לֻח֣וֹת <WH3871> tables הָאֲבָנִ֔ים <WH68> of stone אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which הִנִּ֥חַ <WH3240> put שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> there מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> which Moses בְּחֹרֵ֑ב <WH2722> there at Horeb אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> where כָּרַ֤ת <WH3772> made יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> when the LORD עִם־ <WH5973> with בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> [a covenant] with the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּצֵאתָ֖ם <WH3318> when they came out מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> happened בְּצֵ֥את <WH3318> were come out הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> And it came to pass when the priests מִן־ <WH4480> from הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the holy וְהֶעָנָ֥ן <WH6051> [place] that the cloud מָלֵ֖א <WH4390> filled אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יָכְל֧וּ <WH3201> could הַכֹּהֲנִ֛ים <WH3548> So that the priests לַעֲמֹ֥ד <WH5975> not stand לְשָׁרֵ֖ת <WH8334> to minister מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> because הֶֽעָנָ֑ן <WH6051> of the cloud כִּי־ <WH3588> for מָלֵ֥א <WH4390> had filled כְבוֹד־ <WH3519> for the glory יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD פ

אָ֖ז <WH227> Then אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Then spake שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <WH8010> Solomon יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> The LORD אָמַ֔ר <WH559> said לִשְׁכֹּ֖ן <WH7931> that he would dwell בָּעֲרָפֶֽל׃ <WH6205> in the thick darkness

בָּנֹ֥ה <WH1129> I have surely בָנִ֛יתִי <WH1129> built בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> thee an house זְבֻ֖ל <WH2073> to dwell in לָ֑ךְ מָכ֥וֹן <WH4349> a settled place לְשִׁבְתְּךָ֖ <WH3427> for thee to abide in עוֹלָמִֽים׃ <WH5769> for ever

וַיַּסֵּ֤ב <WH5437> about הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> And the king אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנָ֔יו <WH6440> his face וַיְבָ֕רֶךְ <WH1288> and blessed אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all קְהַ֣ל <WH6951> all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְכָל־ <WH3605> all קְהַ֥ל <WH6951> (and all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel עֹמֵֽד׃ <WH5975> stood

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said בָּר֤וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> [be] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> who דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> which spake בְּפִ֔יו <WH6310> with his mouth אֵ֖ת <WH854> for דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> unto David אָבִ֑י <WH1> my father וּבְיָד֥וֹ <WH3027> and hath with his hand מִלֵּ֖א <WH4390> fulfilled לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> [it] saying

מִן־ <WH4480> Since הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> Since the day אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> i הוֹצֵ֜אתִי <WH3318> that I brought forth אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> my people אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <WH3478> Israel מִמִּצְרַיִם֒ <WH4714> out of Egypt לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not בָחַ֣רְתִּי <WH977> I chose בְעִ֗יר <WH5892> no city מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> of all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> out of all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לִבְנ֣וֹת <WH1129> to build בַּ֔יִת <WH1004> an house לִהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> become שְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> that my name שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> might be there וָאֶבְחַ֣ר <WH977> might be therein but I chose בְּדָוִ֔ד <WH1732> David לִֽהְי֖וֹת <WH1961> become עַל־ <WH5921> to be over עַמִּ֥י <WH5971> to be over my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> become עִם־ <WH5973> in לְבַ֖ב <WH3824> And it was in the heart דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> of David אָבִ֑י <WH1> my father לִבְנ֣וֹת <WH1129> to build בַּ֔יִת <WH1004> an house לְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> for the name יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> about דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> unto David אָבִ֔י <WH1> my father יַ֗עַן <WH3282> because אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after הָיָה֙ <WH1961> become עִם־ <WH5973> in לְבָ֣בְךָ֔ <WH3824> it was in thine heart לִבְנ֥וֹת <WH1129> to build בַּ֖יִת <WH1004> an house לִשְׁמִ֑י <WH8034> unto my name הֱטִיבֹ֔תָ <WH2895> thou didst well כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הָיָ֖ה <WH1961> become עִם־ <WH5973> in לְבָבֶֽךָ׃ <WH3824> that it was in thine heart

רַ֣ק <WH7535> Nevertheless אַתָּ֔ה <WH859> you לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תִבְנֶ֖ה <WH1129> thou shalt not build הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> the house כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but בִּנְךָ֙ <WH1121> but thy son הַיֹּצֵ֣א <WH3318> that shall come forth out מֵחֲלָצֶ֔יךָ <WH2504> of thy loins הֽוּא־ <WH1931> he יִבְנֶ֥ה <WH1129> he shall build הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> the house לִשְׁמִֽי׃ <WH8034> unto my name

וַיָּ֣קֶם <WH6965> hath performed יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָר֖וֹ <WH1697> his word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which דִּבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> that he spake וָאָקֻ֡ם <WH6965> and I am risen up תַּחַת֩ <WH8478> place דָּוִ֨ד <WH1732> in the room of David אָבִ֜י <WH1> my father וָאֵשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> and sit עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסֵּ֣א <WH3678> on the throne יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> promised יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> as the LORD וָאֶבְנֶ֣ה <WH1129> and have built הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> an house לְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> for the name יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וָאָשִׂ֨ם <WH7760> And I have set שָׁ֤ם <WH8033> There מָקוֹם֙ <WH4725> there a place לָֽאָר֔וֹן <WH727> for the ark אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> There בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> wherein [is] the covenant יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which כָּרַת֙ <WH3772> which he made עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <WH1> with our fathers בְּהוֹצִיא֥וֹ <WH3318> when he brought them out אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt ס

וַיַּעֲמֹ֣ד <WH5975> stood שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <WH8010> And Solomon לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> before מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> the altar יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD נֶ֖גֶד <WH5048> in the presence of כָּל־ <WH3605> of all קְהַ֣ל <WH6951> all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּפְרֹ֥שׂ <WH6566> and spread forth כַּפָּ֖יו <WH3709> his hands הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> toward heaven

וַיֹּאמַ֗ר <WH559> And he said יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אֵין־ <WH369> there כָּמ֣וֹךָ <WH3644> like אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> [there is] no God בַּשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> like thee in heaven מִמַּ֔עַל <WH4605> above וְעַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> or on earth מִתָּ֑חַת <WH8478> Thahash שֹׁמֵ֤ר <WH8104> beneath who keepest הַבְּרִית֙ <WH1285> covenant וְֽהַחֶ֔סֶד <WH2617> and mercy לַעֲבָדֶ֕יךָ <WH5650> with thy servants הַהֹלְכִ֥ים <WH1980> that walk לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> before בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לִבָּֽם׃ <WH3820> thee with all their heart
